articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Strong solar flare disrupts radio communications in North America - HT Tech
articles.description: An intense X-level solar flare causes radio blackout in North America.
articles.content: Sun's activity has increased over these past few weeks and it has generated numerous strong solar storms. Currently, Sun is in its 11-year solar cycle and it will reach its maximum next year, which w… [+2054 chars]
